ComicInfo.Summary:
The Venture nears their destination, but the villainous Resolve is hot on their tail, and a heart-pounding aerial skirmish will leave a crewmember of the brave Venture lost in the Antarctic – and travel into the Earth’s core to the land of Pellucidar!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Cary Nord | 1 | B | Cover B | Rags Morales (a) & Emilio Lopez (c) | 2 | C | Cover C | Roberto Castro (a) & Omi Remalante (c) | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Cary Nord | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Cover | Rags Morales | 5 |
